sub_title: Nature Conservation | Climate Change | Environmental, Agricultural & Economic Sustainability Expert
summary:
I am a resilient and highly dedicated professional with over 10 years of progressive work experience, and a proven track record in successfully providing thought leadership, building effective relationships and delivering sustainability initiatives mainly for organizations promoting Nature Conservation, Climate Change, Environmental, and Agricultural, and Economic Sustainability. As an industry expert, I have successfully initiated, led, implemented, and delivered multiple company projects, where I utilized my strong interpersonal skills to influence others towards advanced research, learning, and development and to continuously improve sustainable innovations that integrate environmental considerations into business procurement processes to achieve Corporate Value Chain (Scope 3) visibility in the supply chains. 

I have established a solid reputation as an experienced expert dedicated to delivering exceptional outcomes, innovative and customized projects, and initiatives to attain organizational goals, promote continuous research and learning, and built strong internal and external stakeholder relationships. I have been part of the leadership team for several non-profit organizations and successfully led knowledge and capacity development, and strategic planning to drive impactful business, agricultural, and environmental solutions. I have also worked as a consultant, providing industry intelligence, business advice, and training. 
 
Committed to contributing significantly to sustainable business growth and success, I have proven my competencies in providing thought leadership, building effective relationships, and delivering value-adding business, agricultural, and environmental sustainability initiatives. As a team member, I value collaboration, responsiveness, service-oriented approach that establishes credibility and influences rapid business awareness, social and economic responsibilities, and overall business growth. Equipped with an excellent work ethic, professional resiliency, and a desire to work hard in developing strategic priorities that are consistently aligned with the organization’s goals.

Let's connect here on LinkedIn!
